name: part_003
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】#AZKi生誕祭2022 【ゲスト：ときのそら ⧸ 星街すいせい】 [y3Ed1eCwuOA]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: AZKi completes the performance of '画面の中の君が好き' (Gamen no Naka no Kimi ga Suki) and encourages the audience to wave their hands during the instrumental outro.
AZKi performs the high-energy song '猫ならばいける' (Neko naraba Ikeru), featuring cat-themed choreography and audience chants.
